thread.title: Basketball Recap: Valor Christian Gets the Win
thread.title_full: Basketball Recap: Valor Christian Gets the Win

author: Team Reports
title: Basketball Recap: Valor Christian Gets the Win
text:
A well-balanced attack led Valor Christian over Columbine in every quarter on their way to victory on Wednesday. The Valor Christian Eagles came out on top against the Columbine Rebels by a score of 68-56. That's more bragging rights for the Eagles, who also won the pair's last head-to-head.
Eagles
Previous 2 Games
The win made it two in a row for Valor Christian and bumps their season record up to 9-3. As for Columbine, this is the second loss in a row for them and nudges their season record down to 6-5.
When Valor Christian and Columbine next hit the court, they'll be up against teams who recently just can't seem to lose. Valor Christian will square off against Ralston Valley and their ten-game winning streak at 7:30 p.m. on Friday. Similarly, Columbine will try to stop Arapahoe's five-game winning streak when the meet at 7:30 p.m. on Friday.
